name: Campbell's Attacks
description:
Made for PaintJam 2021

The world is under attack and you must use your trusty tank to fight off the canned attackers. Can you last till the last wave? Or will you find another way out.

How to Play

Use the WASD or Directional buttons to move.

Use 'Space' to shoot.

Extra Info

All code and art assets were written during the jam.

Music and FX from freesound.org

The dark sector  by lappr23

Action movie intro  by oymaldonado

Calm Synthesizer.Cwav by Inspector J

BUG FIX:

  • Fixed bug which caused game over screen to not load.
